channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Heathrow ‘pepper spray' assault: What happened, who was behind attack that left 21 injured?
Why the Goa nightclub fire, which killed 25, was so difficult to contain
History Today: When the United States officially entered World War II
FirstUp: IndiGo flight cuts likely, Zelenskyy to visit Downing Street... The news of the day
Have trouble sleeping? How a ‘potato bed’ might be the answer to your problems
How Australia plans to block under-16s from social media
India’s Brics presidency and US chairing G20 will test New Delhi’s diplomatic balancing in 2026
item.description: India’s approach is pragmatic, not doctrinal: work with whoever is necessary to achieve outcomes. In 2026, this pragmatism will be tested as India balances expectations across very different tables

item.title: New report, old realities: Balochistan remains under Pakistan’s brutal siege
item.description: Violence in Balochistan is not incidental; it is systemic, structured, and historically produced

item.title: Putin’s visit shows India-Russia ties can shape a multipolar world beyond the US-China duopoly
item.description: Within the India-Russia bilateral is the real play of a multipolar world order. Both countries know the depth of their bilateral can survive the savagely changing winds of contemporary geopolitical reality

item.title: Khairabad: The mini-Lucknow built by a Nawab’s tailor
item.description: Today, the stunning set of buildings that stands in Khairabad, about 80 kilometres from Lucknow, is the result of Makka Darzee’s post-retirement work, emulating the architecture and style of Nawabs of Awadh

item.title: Modi presents Bhagavad Gita to Putin: How PM’s gifts reflect deep Indian symbolism
item.description: Unlike the claims made by the colonialists and their sympathisers in the country that no notion of ‘India’ existed before the advent of the British, the celebration of India’s millennia-old symbols in the form of gifts reinforces the country’s ancient identity

item.title: Putin’s visit delivers a big message: India has options, Russia is not isolated
item.description: India effectively signalled its commitment to charting an independent foreign policy path and rejection of a ‘with us or against us’ narrative
